mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (userid, nickname, userpw, email, memberpic) values (#{userid}, #{nickname}, #{userpw}, #{email}, #{memberpic})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userpw = #{userpw}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where userid = #{userid} and userpw = #{userpw}
